name: Tawazon
0:
”Alexa, open tawazon”
”Alexa, tell tawazon to play a random meditation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tawazon
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tawazon Skill - Start your inner journey with Balance!

Tawazon Skill offers short guided meditation backed by scientific evidence.

When opening the skill, you’ll be able to play a random meditation in this stage, with a limited ability to play a meditation by its name until all meditation names are translated. Please note that all meditations are in Arabic only.

Tawazon’s team consists of mental health doctors and mindfulness professionals and is focused on creating meditation sessions in the Arabic language which are designed for all Arab communities around the world, taking into consideration the important role the mother language plays in the effectiveness of meditation making the skill a power tool to help your with the stress generated by our modern lifestyle.

Please note that this skill is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number

Read more about our privacy policy, terms & conditions:

http://tawazonapp.com/terms-and-conditions

http://tawazonapp.com/privacy-policy
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
